sentences.en: His love of conversation, his affection, his indifference to riches, even his garrulity, are interesting traits of character.
sentences.cn: 他热爱恳谈，他的友爱倾向，他对富人的冷淡，还有他的多嘴饶舌，使他成为性格鲜明的风趣人物。

sentences.en: She said nothing when met you, changing the former days garrulity.
sentences.cn: 见了面她一改往日的喋喋不休，望着你不说话。

words.tran_cn: 唠叨的；喋喋不休的；多嘴的
多嘴多舌；喋喋不休；多话；唠叨（原形是garrulous）
